title: Johan & Shoghi：关于新测试版的信息
author: BensonQC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 _Benson_ 于 2015-4-10 18:34 编辑 





Johan & Shoghi：
We have had some reports of people running Android 5 that crashes when the game has been running for ~5min. Turn off wifi for now. :)
Sorry, ~15 seconds not min. I call it the 15 seconds crash. :)
We will try to get a new #mcpe 0.11 test build today to fix some of the issues people are having.
Johan & Shoghi：
我们有一些人们在Android 5的情况下，当游戏运行5分钟时崩溃的报告。请立即关闭WIFI。:)
对不起，是15秒，而不是分钟。我把它叫做15秒崩溃。:)
我们将尽力取得一个新的MCPE的0.11测试版来修复人们现有的漏洞。
